contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|hind}} '''Hind''' may refer to: * A female [[deer]], especially a red deer * Hind and [[al-Hind]], a Persian and Arabic name for India *[[Hindi]], the most widely spoken language in India *[[Hindu]], a follower of Hinduism *[[Hind (crater)]], a lunar impact crater *[[Hind (video game)]], a helicopter game simulation by Digital Integration *[[Hawker Hind]], a Royal Air Force light-bomber of the inter-war years *[[Mil Mi-24]], a helicopter, codenamed the "Hind" by NATO ==People== * [[Hind (name)]] * [[Hind (singer)]], Bahraini singer ==See also== *{{in title}} *[[Epinephelus]], a genus of groupers sometimes referred to as hinds *''[[Golden Hind]]'', a ship captained by Sir Francis Drake between 1577 and 1580 *[[Hinds (disambiguation)]] *[[Hinde (surname)]] {{disambiguation}}
